breadCrumbs.text: How will you build 1-stage further competition

title: How will you build 1-stage further competition?

form.question: You can choose to either enter the information online to build your one stage further competition or upload your own document.

hint.text: Enter all the information needed to build your one stage further competition online and submit it to your selected suppliers.

items.text: Upload only your statement of requirements but finish the bid pack online

hint.text: Use this option to upload attachement and complete the assessment online.

items.text: Complete and upload the whole bid pack

hint.text: Use this option to prepare your one stage further competition offline and then upload it.
